channel.title: Armadyl
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101011190135/tormentdsoulz/images/e/ea/Armadylgodvg4.gif[/img] Armadyl will be a server which will welcome all sorts of players whether you are a Skiller, a Pker, a Pvmer we will have many fun things for you to do and a ton of goals for you to accomplish. Armadyl will have a wide variety of bosses to battle, quests to complete and of course there will be a vast wilderness for you all to battle in. I myself am a big fan of multi clan pking so you can expect bi-weekly server wars with prizes for the clan that comes out on top! Of course we haven't forgotten the skillers, there will be 21+ skills for you all to complete and if you manage to master them all you will receive the legendary Completionist Cape to show-off to you're friends.
Server Base : http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/515931-project-insanity-netty-framework-rs2server-game-engine-all-dupes-fixed.html Client Base : Original Project insanity base client
Developers Ranno - Ahridok Jamal - Roone/RooneyScape [b]Update Log[/b] [code][30-10-2013] - Source and Client downloaded [30-10-2013] - Repackaged base [30-10-2013] - Removed all Skills, Minigames etc.. [30-10-2013] - Clan chat has been removed will be working on a better base [01-11-2013] - Clanchat has nearly been completed (Creating/Banning/Kicking/Changing Clan name/Who can enter the chat or who can talk/Who can kick/Ranks) [01-11-2013] - Ctrl + V has been added to the client [01-11-2013] - Exp Drops have been added along with the Exp counter [01-11-2013] - Basic Summoning base has been added (No specials/Cannot store any items in a BoB) You can currently Dismiss you're familliar [01-11-2013] - Items kept on death added with current carried wealt [02-11-2013] - Ranging guild has been added [02-11-2013] - Player resting for faster rune energy has been added [02-11-2013] - Reworked many weapon specials including Dark bow/Dragon claws/Dragon daggers/Granite maul [/code] [b]Media[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/56RPc.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/56RUr.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/56RWs.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/56S2v.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/55Kbs.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/55JU1.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/55JZc.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/55JZM.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: Armadyl
item.dc:creator: @Sfacciato Sfacciato
item.description:
@Sfacciato wrote:

jamal123:

Looks good keep it up!

First post since 2011 eh? lol.

Jamal huh? Unique name I suppose…

[quote=“rooneyscape, post:1, topic:535451”]Developer(s)
Jamal - Roone/RooneyScape/Armadyl-Rs[/quote]

[hr]

In any case… goodluck on this or whichever project you’re currently focusing on!

item.title: Armadyl

@rooneyscape wrote:

[center]

Armadyl will be a server which will welcome all sorts of players whether you are a Skiller, a Pker, a Pvmer we will have many fun things for you to do and a ton of goals for you to accomplish. Armadyl will have a wide variety of bosses to battle, quests to complete and of course there will be a vast wilderness for you all to battle in. I myself am a big fan of multi clan pking so you can expect bi-weekly server wars with prizes for the clan that comes out on top! Of course we haven’t forgotten the skillers, there will be 21+ skills for you all to complete and if you manage to master them all you will receive the legendary Completionist Cape to show-off to you’re friends.
